data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during PANTER cruise from Curaçao to St. Eustacius started at 1830-05-31
Ship: Panter (Brik), Voyage: Curaçao - St Eustacius, 1st Observer: D. Buijs (Kltz), Company: MAR, Other ship information: BEMAND MET 106 KOPPEN. 16 KANONADES VAN 30 POND. 2 STUKKEN VAN 6 POND
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
